title: New free champion rotation: Kassadin, Ezreal, Aatrox and more!

replies.body: BREAKING NEWS: A FLOOD OF EXTREMELY BAD KASSADINS HAS BEEN FORECAST TO ARRIVE IN THE NEXT 24 HOURS. EVERYONE NEEDS TO EVACUATE MID LANE IMMEDIATELY.

{{champion:40}} This is weather woman Janna reporting in and now with your local news lets send it to Draven at the desk

To bad {{champion:121}} won't be able to fight back against a {{champion:107}}. RIP Kha'zix 4.9 ;(
At least with all the terrible Rengar players that will crop up this week, Kha'Zix might win for once.
nah... ill be taking advantage of all the shitty kha players and get my khazix heads.

I don't understand why people call Kha unplayable now. He's definitely not a fighter anymore, which he wasn't supposed to be, but he still functions fine as an assassin. Have you seen his Q's isolation damage? 700-900. I'm not even exaggerating that. Truly this "nerf" has changed Kha into what he was originally supposed to be: an assassin who punishes isolated targets.
i just dont like how being near towers=no isolation
'Who needs normal eyes' week. {{champion:266}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}}

I wish to contribute my name to become a new champion. I have defeated countless enemies, and laid them at my feet for everyone to see. I would request that this champion have a feature that kills everyone by pressing the ult button.

Thank you.
Okay Karthus.{{champion:30}}
fail we already have {{champion:56}} and {{champion:115}} and {{champion:99}} and {{champion:81}} and {{item:3022}} they can get quadras or pentas in 1 r
One of those is an item, one of those only has a single target ult, and they all hardly ever hit more than two people, let alone kill 5.

{{champion:31}} Big Bug. {{champion:121}} Small Bug. {{champion:96}} Worm Bug. {{champion:161}} Tentacle Bug. {{champion:60}} Spider Bug. (Someone lecture me that spiders are not bugs.) {{champion:38}} Kills Bugs.
You're wrong. Spiders are bugs, but not insects. They're different. And scorpions are their cousins. :)

Okay, I'm a geek (NOT a nerd- nerd is a furry creature with glasses made by Dr. Seuss), but spiders are not bugs. Bugs (Hemiptera) are a order of insects under Domain Eukaryote, Kingdom Animalia,  Phylum Arthropod, Class Insecta, referring to insects with a proboscis. There are a lot more of levels to that but I must confess I barely understand them all, so I'll leave the list at that, the major ones. Spiders, however, only share the same phylum (and, of course, larger groupings above) in Domain Eukaryote, Kingdom Animalia,  Phylum Arthropod, Class Arachnida, and spiders specifically are the order Araneae. 

TL;DR: Bugs are a subclass of insects. Spiders and Bugs share the same Phylum.
Thanks for enlightening me. :) {{champion:26}}
But didn't you KNOW he was going to say that already?{{champion:26}}
What about{{champion:143}}? Attract bugs?
Gets eaten by bug?
